bill.summary: 6/10/1993--Introduced. Amends the National and Community Service Act of 1990 to establish a preference that projects under grants for Youth Corps and National and Community Service programs be conducted in areas where they are needed most, including areas adversely affected by Federal actions related to the management of Federal lands that result in significant regional job losses and economic dislocation.
